Package scraper

Class Scraper

java.lang.Object
scraper.Scraper
public class Scraper
extends java.lang.Object
Scraper is a class that can be used to scrape HTML content from a URL, String or File. An instance of the Scraper class can be created with a URL, String or File through buildScraperWithURL, buildScraperWithString or buildScraperWithHtmlFile.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vetle Jahr

    • createScraperWithURL

      public static Scraper createScraperWithURL​(java.lang.String url)
      A method for creating a Scraper object with a URL using a builder pattern.
      Parameters:
      url - URL for the website to use the Scraper object on
      Returns:
      Scraper Object built with the specified url

    • createScraperWithString

      public static Scraper createScraperWithString​(java.lang.String htmlString)
      Method for creating a Scraper object with an HTML string using a builder pattern
      Parameters:
      htmlString - String in HTML format to use the Scraper object on
      Returns:
      Scraper Object built with a specified String.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • getElementsFromTag

      public java.util.ArrayList<HtmlElement> getElementsFromTag​(java.lang.String htmlTag)
      Get list of HtmlElements from site based on tag name.
      Parameters:
      htmlTag - name of the html tag to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of HtmlElements from requested tag.

    • getElementsFromClass

      public java.util.ArrayList<HtmlElement> getElementsFromClass​(java.lang.String className)
      Gets a list of HtmlElements from the site based on the value of the class attribute of the Html tag.
      Parameters:
      className - Value of the class attribute of the html tags to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of HtmlElements with the requested class attribute.

    • getElementsByXpath

      public java.util.ArrayList<HtmlElement> getElementsByXpath​(java.lang.String xPath) throws InvalidXPathException
      Gets a list of HtmlElements from the site base on the specified XPath.
      Parameters:
      xPath - XPath to retrieve elements from.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of HtmlElements from the XPath.
      Throws:
      InvalidXPathException - if the XPath is invalid.

    • getElementByXpath

      public HtmlElement getElementByXpath​(java.lang.String xPath) throws InvalidXPathException
      Gets a HtmlElement object based on the specified XPath.
      Parameters:
      xPath - XPath to use to retrieve the HtmlElement object.
      Returns:
      HtmlElement object with the specified XPath.
      Throws:
      InvalidXPathException - if the specified XPath is invalid.

    • getElementByCssSelector

      public HtmlElement getElementByCssSelector​(java.lang.String cssSelector)
      Gets a HtmlElement object based on the specified CssSelector string.
      Parameters:
      cssSelector - String to define the path to the HtmlElement object using Css Selector syntax.
      Returns:
      HtmlElement object with the specified CssSelector.
